snippet: Among 11 proposed amendments to the Florida Constitution, No. 6 would ban state money for abortions, and No. 8 would remove language barring religious institutions from receiving state money.
abstract: Among 11 proposed amendments to the Florida Constitution, one would ban state money for abortions, and another would remove language barring religious institutions from receiving state money; both issues have galvanized supporters and opponents, and could have far-reaching repercussions.
lead_paragraph: Among 11 proposed amendments to the Florida Constitution, No. 6 would ban state money for abortions, and No. 8 would remove language barring religious institutions from receiving state money.

headline.seo: Floridians Face Initiatives on Abortion and Church and State
headline.main: Voters in Florida Are Set to Weigh In on Two Contentious Ballot Questions
headline.print_headline: Voters in Florida Are Set to Weigh In on Two Contentious Ballot Questions
